user_question: How can I improve my sleep quality and generate an image of a peaceful bedroom?
final_answer: To improve sleep quality: maintain a consistent sleep schedule, create a restful environment, limit exposure to screens before bed, and practice relaxation techniques. Image of a peaceful bedroom generated. A specific relaxation technique is progressive muscle relaxation, where you tense and then slowly release each muscle group.
